import "./About.css"; function About() { return (

About Us

Choosing the right career at the right stage is one of the most important decisions in a studentâ€™s life. Our Career and Education Advisor platform is designed to support students in making informed career choices by providing structured guidance and recommendations.

Problems Students Face

Students often select career paths without understanding their interests or strengths.
Lack of proper guidance after 10th and intermediate leads to confusion.
Limited awareness of available courses and institutions.
Career decisions made early can affect long-term growth.

Our Platform Offers

Career Assessment

Analyzes student interests, skills, and academic background to identify suitable career paths.

Course Recommendation

Suggests relevant degree programs, certifications, and skill development options.

Institution Guidance

Provides information about colleges and institutions offering recommended courses.

Our Solution

  • Personalized career guidance
  • Accurate course and college suggestions
  • User-friendly and accessible platform
  • Supports students at every academic stage
); } export default About;
